title: WWIII Team Yankee: British Army Book (WW3-02)
description: This book contains all of the information you need to field a British Army force in World War III Team Yankee. The book contains unit stats and formation charts as well background information and a painting guide for the Britihs Army of World War III. Includes new British units such as the Challenger MBT, Warrior Infantry Fighting Vehicle,Â  Chieftan mounted Marksman AA gun system, and more!
